ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Russian Arctic and Antarctic Magnetometer (RAM) network
ResourceHeader.Description: The Russian Arctic and Antarctic Magnetometer (RAM) network consists of station in Antarctica and the Arctic. Information on the station locations are available at their homepage and some data are avaiable for download. The main goals are to: examine High-latitude geophysical phenomena and monitoring of space weather and understand the influence of solar activity and magnetospheric perturbations on atmospheric phenomena and processes.
